title: Dinosaur National Monument: Rainbow Park Campground
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Camping     Rainbow Park Campground                Rainbow Park Campground         View of the Green River from campsite at the Rainbow Park Campground NPS  Rainbow Park Campground is 28 miles from the Quarry Visitor Center in the Utah portion of the monument. It is located on a dirt road that is impassable when wet. The campground is located on the Green River near the boat ramp at the head of Split Mountain Canyon. Rainbow Park Campground is open year-round, but there is no winter maintenance on the unpaved road.  Â         Sites   4 walk-in sites that accommodate tents.   Maximum group size of 8 people per site. Larger groups will need multiple sites.   Fees   $6.00 per site, per night. (Interagency Senior or Access Pass holders receive a 50% discount on campsite fees).   Season   Open all year. Road may be impassable in winter.   Reservations   No Reservations. All sites are first come, first-served.   Facilities and Services   No water   Vault toilets available   Picnic tables   Campfire ring with grill. See information kiosk for any fire restrictions.   Trash and recycling   River launch site
